content:
# Factorio Factory Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operations
#### Coal Mining Operation at Position(16.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 0.0) - currently working with 1 coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at position(17.5, -0.5) for coal storage with 83 coal
- Burner inserter at position(18.5, -0.5) that takes items from outside and puts them into the chest
- Burner inserter at position(17.5, 0.5) that takes coal from the chest but has no output destination

#### Coal Mining Operation at Position(16.0, 3.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 3.0) - currently working with 1 coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at position(17.5, 2.5) for coal storage with 195 coal

### Power Generation System
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, -0.5) producing water
- PipeGroup with water at position(-8.5, -0.5) connected to the offshore pump
- Additional pipes at positions (-8.5, -1.5) and (-7.5, -1.5)
- Boiler at position(-5.0, -0.5) with RIGHT orientation and coal as fuel
- Steam engine at position(-5.5, -3.5) with RIGHT orientation - not connected properly
- Burner inserter at position(-4.5, 1.5) for feeding coal to the boiler
- Second offshore pump at position(-9.5, 1.5) (not connected to the system)

### Iron Mining and Smelting
#### Iron Mining at Position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 71.0) mining iron ore - currently working with 1 coal as fuel
- Stone furnace at position(16.0, 74.0) with 20 coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at position(16.5, 72.5) for iron ore storage with 247 iron ore
- Wooden chest at position(16.5, 76.5) for iron plate storage

#### Iron Smelting at Position(50.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(50.0, 0.0) with 2 coal as fuel, currently not smelting with 53 iron plates produced
- Burner inserter at position(48.5, 0.5) with RIGHT orientation for feeding iron ore to the furnace
- Burner inserter at position(52.5, 0.5) with RIGHT orientation for removing iron plates from the furnace

### Steel Smelting at Position(60.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(60.0, 0.0) with 16 coal as fuel, currently not smelting with 1 steel plate produced

### Copper Mining and Smelting
#### Copper Mining at Position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-46.0, 71.0) mining copper ore - currently working with 1 coal as fuel
- Stone furnace at position(-46.0, 74.0) with 20 coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at position(-45.5, 72.5) for copper ore storage with 348 copper ore
- Burner inserter at position(-45.5, 75.5) that moves processed copper from furnace
- Wooden chest at position(-45.5, 76.5) for copper plate storage

#### Copper Smelting at Position(50.0, 5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(50.0, 5.0) with 9 coal as fuel, currently not smelting with 35 copper plates produced

### Stone Processing at Position(30.0, 50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(30.0, 50.0) with 12 coal as fuel, currently not smelting
